situation: Given is a solid 80-mm diameter steel pole 2.5m in length. Shear Modulus = 78 GPa

subquestions.question: Which of the following gives the axial rigidity of the pole in 1x10<sup>9</sup>N?
Which of the following gives the flexural rigidity of the pole in 1x10<sup>9</sup>N-mm<sup>2</sup>?
Which of the following gives the torsional rigidity of the pole in 1x10<sup>9</sup>N-mm<sup>2</sup>?
